name: Ro'
description:
In this short game, you'll have to complete the levels by consuming all the orbs.
However, this task can only be completed with the help of your memory.

Are you afraid of an easy challenge? Will you give up before reaching level two(2)?
Are you up to the task?

Well then, test yourself out with Ro'.

indigo balls: slightly increase/decrease the speed of all the other balls
white balls : takes the previous color of the player before change
blue balls : slows the player down by 4 seconds
black balls : renders the player invisibleShortcuts:
Arrow Keys / WASD : movements
P : pause
L : replay
R : change rotation
V : share score
ESC : quite
